My question was what is the exact difference between a 480p and a 720p BrRip?

:D

Thx for replying and for backing my request zax808. Anyway how is the video bitrate envolved in this? I'm  guessing that a 720p Rip requires a higher bitrate then a 420p Rip? And that this would problaby change the filesize. A 720p Rip would be bigger in size then a 420p Rip.
I'm just interested in how these (new to me) H264 BRRips work and why they usualy come in MP4 format, I'v also seen 'em in MKV format.

I'm now a big fan of SecretMyth, MajorTJKong and Lifechanger torrents. (also NewArtRiot, his uploads made me interested in other H264 Rippers)

To the uploaders thx for all your effort and I realy hope you guys wil rip "Defiance" but I will understand that you guys may have other priorities at the moment... StarTrek 2009 for example...
Anyway keep up the good work!!!

:D
